languages.text: "Мы принимаем и отправляем послания. Часами и днями мы скитаемся в темных пучинах {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Имматериума{/g}, несем свой голос сквозь пустоту. Доносим его до наших братьев в удаленном приюте. Принимаем в свою обитель чужие голоса, чужие сигналы, послания. Чаще всего — предназначенные вам, Ваша Светлость, иногда же... не предназначенные никому".

traits.locale_text: "Мы принимаем и отправляем послания. Часами и днями мы скитаемся в темных пучинах Имматериума, несем свой голос сквозь Вечную Ночь. Доносим его до наших братьев в удаленном приюте. Принимаем в свою обитель чужие голоса, чужие сигналы, послания. Чаще всего — предназначенные вам, Ваша Светлость, иногда же... не предназначенные никому".

languages.text: "We receive and send messages. For hours turning into days, we wander the dark depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} carrying our voice through the warp's eternal night. Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."
languages.original_text: "Мы принимаем и отправляем послания. Часами и днями мы скитаемся в темных пучинах {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Имматериума{/g}, несем свой голос сквозь пустоту. Доносим его до наших братьев в удаленном приюте. Принимаем в свою обитель чужие голоса, чужие сигналы, послания. Чаще всего — предназначенные вам, Ваша Светлость, иногда же... не предназначенные никому".

traits.locale_text: "We receive and send messages. For hours turning into days, we wander the dark depths of the Immaterium carrying our voice through the Eternal Night. Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."

Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."

Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."

languages.text: «Recibimos y enviamos mensajes. Durante horas que se alargan en días, recorremos las profundidades negras del {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Inmaterio{/g} para empujar nuestras voces por la noche eterna de la disformidad, para llevarlas hasta nuestros camaradas en algún refugio remoto. Aceptamos las voces, las señales y las misivas ajenas en nuestro propio hogar. La mayor parte de ellas se dirigen a usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero a veces... no están dirigidas a nadie».
languages.original_text: "We receive and send messages. For hours turning into days, we wander the dark depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} carrying our voice through the warp's eternal night. Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."

traits.locale_text: «Recibimos y enviamos mensajes. Durante horas que se alargan en días, recorremos las profundidades negras del Inmaterio para empujar nuestras voces por la noche eterna de la disformidad, para llevarlas hasta nuestros camaradas en algún refugio remoto. Aceptamos las voces, las señales y las misivas ajenas en nuestro propio hogar. La mayor parte de ellas se dirigen a usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero a veces... no están dirigidas a nadie».

languages.text: 「私たちはメッセージを受け取って、送信する。何時間が、何日にもなって、私たちは{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}非物質世界{/g}の暗い深淵をさまよい、<歪み>の永遠なる夜の中で私たちの声を伝えるのだ。離れた避難所にいる同志のもとへとな。他の者の声や信号、メッセージ、文書を自分のナカに受け入れる。そういったものの大抵が、あなたのためのものだ、陛下。そしてたまに…誰のためでもないときもある」
languages.original_text: "We receive and send messages. For hours turning into days, we wander the dark depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} carrying our voice through the warp's eternal night. Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはメッセージを受け取って、送信する。何時間が、何日にもなって、私たちは非物質世界の暗い深淵をさまよい、<歪み>の永遠なる夜の中で私たちの声を伝えるのだ。離れた避難所にいる同志のもとへとな。他の者の声や信号、メッセージ、文書を自分のナカに受け入れる。そういったものの大抵が、あなたのためのものだ、陛下。そしてたまに…誰のためでもないときもある」

languages.text: “我们负责接收、发送信息，有的时候是几个小时，有的时候长达几天。我们带着我们的声音，穿过{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}亚空间{/g}的漫漫永夜，徘徊在至高天的黑暗深处。我们会把这些信息带给偏远星域的同道之人，也会聆听他人的声音、信号、讯息，把它们带到我们这里。像这样的信息，通常都是指定发送给您的，大人。还有的信息……没有特定的接收者。”
languages.original_text: "We receive and send messages. For hours turning into days, we wander the dark depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} carrying our voice through the warp's eternal night. Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."

traits.locale_text: “我们负责接收、发送信息，有的时候是几个小时，有的时候长达几天。我们带着我们的声音，穿过亚空间的漫漫永夜，徘徊在至高天的黑暗深处。我们会把这些信息带给偏远星域的同道之人，也会聆听他人的声音、信号、讯息，把它们带到我们这里。像这样的信息，通常都是指定发送给您的，大人。还有的信息……没有特定的接收者。”

languages.text: "Wir empfangen und versenden Nachrichten. Stundenlang, tagelang irren wir durch die dunklen Tiefen des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immateriums{/g}, tragen unsere Stimme durch die ewige Nacht des Warps. Wir tragen sie zu unseren Kameraden in irgendeiner entlegenen Zuflucht. Wir lassen die Stimmen, Signale und Nachrichten anderer in unser eigenes Heim ein. Meist sind sie für Euch bestimmt, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und manchmal ... sind sie für niemanden bestimmt."
languages.original_text: "We receive and send messages. For hours turning into days, we wander the dark depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} carrying our voice through the warp's eternal night. Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."

traits.locale_text: "Wir empfangen und versenden Nachrichten. Stundenlang, tagelang irren wir durch die dunklen Tiefen des Immateriums, tragen unsere Stimme durch die ewige Nacht des Warps. Wir tragen sie zu unseren Kameraden in irgendeiner entlegenen Zuflucht. Wir lassen die Stimmen, Signale und Nachrichten anderer in unser eigenes Heim ein. Meist sind sie für Euch bestimmt, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und manchmal ... sind sie für niemanden bestimmt."

languages.text: « Nous recevons et envoyons des messages. Heure après heure, jour après jour, nous écumons les profondeurs ténébreuses de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} en donnant de la voix dans la nuit éternelle du Warp. Ce faisant, nous communiquons avec nos camarades réfugiés dans de lointaines contrées et nous réceptionnons à notre tour leurs voix, signaux et missives. La plupart du temps, c'est à vous qu'ils sont destinés, Votre Seigneurie, mais parfois... il arrive qu'ils ne s'adressent à personne en particulier. »
languages.original_text: "We receive and send messages. For hours turning into days, we wander the dark depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} carrying our voice through the warp's eternal night. Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."

Ce faisant, nous communiquons avec nos camarades réfugiés dans de lointaines contrées et nous réceptionnons à notre tour leurs voix, signaux et missives. La plupart du temps, c'est à vous qu'ils sont destinés, Votre Seigneurie, mais parfois... il arrive qu'ils ne s'adressent à personne en particulier. »

languages.text: "Mesajları alır ve iletiriz. Saatlerce, hatta bazen günlerce {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Tindiyar{/g}'ın karanlık derinliklerinde geziniriz. Sesimizi öteboyutun ebedî gecesi boyunca ileterek uzaklara sığınan yoldaşlarımıza taşırız. Başkalarından gelen sesleri, sinyalleri ve tezkereleri yuvamıza buyur ederiz. Bunlar sıklıkla size yönelik olur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ve bazen... Onları başkalarının görmemesi gerekir."
languages.original_text: "We receive and send messages. For hours turning into days, we wander the dark depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g} carrying our voice through the warp's eternal night. Bringing it to our comrades in some remote refuge. Accepting the voices, signals, and missives of others into our own abode. Those are most often meant for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and at times... they are meant for no one."
